resources.string: A variable is being created when you assign a value to it.

NOTE: Variable names are case sensitive.
Variables can store numeric and string data
In here we can see that the variable that we created is quiz and store the value of String data “variables”

Exercise:
What variable name is the correct to print the score 10

Arithmetic operators are used to perform mathematical operations
like addition, subtraction, multiplication and division.

+ Addition: adds two operands
– Subtraction: subtracts two operands
* Multiplication: multiplies two operands
/ Division (float): divides the first operand by the second
% Modulus: returns the remainder when first operand is divided by the second
** Power : Returns first raised to power second
It is a combination of values, variables, and operators.
